General.Name: Ob’’yedinennaya Aviastroitel’naya Korporatsiya PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company United Aircraft Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, manufacture, sale, and aftersales maintenance of civil, military, transport, and special-purpose aircraft in Russia. The company offers aircraft primarily under the Sukhoi, MiG, Ilyushin, Tupolev, Yakovlev, Irkut, Sukhoi Superjet 100, and Beriev brands. It also offers operational support, warranty and servicing, modernization, and repair services, as well as civil and military aircraft disposal services. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.
